blocks.content_html: Communicate service outages to your customers with a public status page. The best part: it's free.
Monitor the availability of your web site, application, and other managed services.
Help your customers by giving them an easy-to-use knowledge base.

content_blocks.content_html:
The Lean20 Vision

The idea is simple.
Venture-scale companies are pressured with relentless pursuit of revenue growth which has an inevitable impact on software complexity and price.

Commodity services.
Cloud computing allows us to reduce many products to only the features truly needed for the lowest possible price.

The 80/20 rule.
80% of software features are used by less than 20% of users. Our focus is eliminating those, supporting only the highest value functionality.

Bootstrapped and hand-crafted.
We never outsource development. We are built with love from Seattle and have the experience and passion to keep it that way.

content_blocks.heading: Find the perfect plan for your business
content_blocks.subheading: All plans include our award winning sales optimization solution to track your sales in real time.

questions.question_text: What types of payment do you accept?
questions.answer_text: Credit cards including MasterCard, Visa or American Express.

questions.question_text: Can I change my plan at a later time?
questions.answer_text: Yes, you can upgrade and downgrade your plan at anytime.

questions.question_text: Do you offer pricing for nonprofit organizations?
questions.answer_text: Yes, send us a message and we'll set you up on our nonprofit pricing.
Contact us for any further questions at john@business.com.
